vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀποχωρ-ίζω,
separate from, τὸ χεῖρον ἀπὸ βελτίονος[Refs 5th c.BC+]:—passive, to be separated from, πυρός[Refs]
__2 separate, set apart, detach, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἀ. ὡς ἓν εἶδος separate and put into one class, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__3 passive, to be vomited, [Refs 3rd c.BC+] middle in [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to part company, be separated; to recede, be split
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to part company, be separated; to recede, be split
to separate;, passive to be swept aside, to recede, be split Rev. 6:14; middle to part, part company, be separated Acts 15:39*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: separarse ; tal vez desaparecer o abrirse violentamente (APOC.6:14)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: phân rẽ; chia tách; dời đi
